project.description: this project is for radia test new supervisor image build

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: update_gunicorn
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: True:update gunicorn container only False:update container except gunicorn

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e
GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" #IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) IMAGE_VERSION=v0.0.1 PROJECT_NAME="radia-test-control"
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then IMAGE_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) fi
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/ else echo "docker not installed." exit fi
if [ $update_gunicorn == "True" ];then
###################gunicorn################### cd $WORKSPACE/build/k8s-pod/web/gunicorn/
cat Dockerfile
docker build --no-cache -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/gunicorn:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/gunicorn:$IMAGE_VERSION
docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/gunicorn:$IMAGE_VERSION
else # update container except gunicorn
###################case_resolver################### cd $WORKSPACE/build/k8s-pod/web/case_resolver/
sed -i "s|radia-test/gunicorn|swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/gunicorn:$IMAGE_VERSION|" ./Dockerfile
cat Dockerfile
docker build --no-cache -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/case_resolver:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/case_resolver:$IMAGE_VERSION
###################case_updator################### cd $WORKSPACE/build/k8s-pod/web/case_updator/
sed -i "s|radia-test/gunicorn|swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/gunicorn:$IMAGE_VERSION|" ./Dockerfile
cat Dockerfile
docker build --no-cache -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/case_updator:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/case_updator:$IMAGE_VERSION
###################celerybeat################### cd $WORKSPACE/build/k8s-pod/web/celerybeat/
sed -i "s|radia-test/gunicorn|swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/gunicorn:$IMAGE_VERSION|" ./Dockerfile
cat Dockerfile
docker build --no-cache -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/celerybeat:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/celerybeat:$IMAGE_VERSION
###################lifecycle_monitor################### cd $WORKSPACE/build/k8s-pod/web/lifecycle_monitor/
sed -i "s|radia-test/gunicorn|swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/gunicorn:$IMAGE_VERSION|" ./Dockerfile
cat Dockerfile
docker build --no-cache -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/lifecycle_monitor:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/lifecycle_monitor:$IMAGE_VERSION
###################repo_reader################### cd $WORKSPACE/build/k8s-pod/web/repo_reader/
sed -i "s|radia-test/gunicorn|swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/gunicorn:$IMAGE_VERSION|" ./Dockerfile
cat Dockerfile
docker build --no-cache -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/repo_reader:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/repo_reader:$IMAGE_VERSION
###################script_loader################### cd $WORKSPACE/build/k8s-pod/web/script_loader/
sed -i "s|radia-test/gunicorn|swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/gunicorn:$IMAGE_VERSION|" ./Dockerfile
cat Dockerfile
docker build --no-cache -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/script_loader:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/script_loader:$IMAGE_VERSION
###################set_resolver################### cd $WORKSPACE/build/k8s-pod/web/set_resolver/
sed -i "s|radia-test/gunicorn|swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/gunicorn:$IMAGE_VERSION|" ./Dockerfile
cat Dockerfile
docker build --no-cache -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/set_resolver:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/set_resolver:$IMAGE_VERSION
###################suite_updator################### cd $WORKSPACE/build/k8s-pod/web/suite_updator/
sed -i "s|radia-test/gunicorn|swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/gunicorn:$IMAGE_VERSION|" ./Dockerfile
cat Dockerfile
docker build --no-cache -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/suite_updator:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/suite_updator:$IMAGE_VERSION
###################task_updator################### cd $WORKSPACE/build/k8s-pod/web/task_updator/
sed -i "s|radia-test/gunicorn|swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/gunicorn:$IMAGE_VERSION|" ./Dockerfile
cat Dockerfile
docker build --no-cache -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/task_updator:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/task_updator:$IMAGE_VERSION
###################clean docker image###################
docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/case_resolver:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/case_updator:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/celerybeat:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/lifecycle_monitor:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/repo_reader:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/script_loader:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/set_resolver:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/suite_updator:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/task_updator:$IMAGE_VERSION
fi # if [ $update_gunicorn == "True" ];then
if [ -d "infra-common" ]; then rm -rf "infra-common" fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-common cd infra-common/common-applications/test-environment/radiaTest else echo "git is not existing." fi
if [ $update_gunicorn == "True" ];then
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/gunicorn:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
else
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/case_resolver:$IMAGE_VERSION kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/case_updator:$IMAGE_VERSION kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/celerybeat:$IMAGE_VERSION kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/lifecycle_monitor:$IMAGE_VERSION kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/repo_reader:$IMAGE_VERSION kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/script_loader:$IMAGE_VERSION kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/set_resolver:$IMAGE_VERSION kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/suite_updator:$IMAGE_VERSION kustomize edit set image swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/radia-test/task_updator:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update radiaTest server" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi ARGOCD_TOKEN=`curl -X POST -s -d '{"password":"'${ARGOCD_PASS}'","username":"'${ARGOCD_USER}'"}' "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/session"|tail -1 |awk -F '[""]' '{print$4}'`>/dev/null curl -X POST -s -o /dev/null --cookie "argocd.token=${ARGOCD_TOKEN}" "https://build.osinfra.cn/api/v1/applications/${PROJECT_NAME}/sync">/dev/null if [ $? -eq 0 ];then echo "complete!" else echo "failed!" fi
